00013 #include "sys/types.h"

00015 #include "config_reader.h"
00016 #include "trackinfo.h"
00017 
00018 string DB_CONNECT;
00019 string AUDIO_PATH;  
00020 
00021 Connection *C;
00022 vector<trackinfo*> *newTracks;
00023 vector<trackinfo*> *currentTracks;
00024     
00025 void frmAdmin::init() {
00026     config_reader *Conf = new config_reader("digiplay");
00027 
00028     if (Conf->isDefined("DB_HOST"))
00029         DB_CONNECT += "hostaddr=" + Conf->getParam("DB_HOST") + " ";
00030     if (Conf->isDefined("DB_NAME"))
00031         DB_CONNECT += "dbname=" + Conf->getParam("DB_NAME") + " ";
00032     if (Conf->isDefined("DB_USER"))
00033         DB_CONNECT += "user=" + Conf->getParam("DB_USER") + " ";
00034     if (Conf->isDefined("AUDIO_PATH"))
00035         AUDIO_PATH = Conf->getParam("AUDIO_PATH");
00036 
00037     if (AUDIO_PATH == "") {
00038         cout << "FATAL: Missing or invalid AUDIO_PATH setting" << endl;
00039         cout << "  -> Check /etc/digiplay is correct" << endl;
00040         exit(-1);
00041     }
00042     if (AUDIO_PATH.substr(AUDIO_PATH.size() - 2, 1) != "/") {
00043         AUDIO_PATH += "/";
00044     }
00045     if (DB_CONNECT == "") {
00046         cout << "FATAL: No database connection defined" << endl;
00047         cout << "  -> Check /etc/digiplay defined database connection" << endl;
00048         exit(-1);
00049     }
00050     cout << "Database: " << DB_CONNECT << endl;
00051     C  = new Connection(DB_CONNECT);
00052     newTracks = new vector<trackinfo*>;
00053     currentTracks = new vector<trackinfo*>;
00054 }

00074 void frmAdmin::ScanTracks()
00075 {
00076     DIR *dirp;
00077     struct dirent *dp;
00078     string filename, path;
00079     trackinfo *newTrack;
00080     unsigned int subdir;
00081     
00082     cout << "Scanning info files..." << endl;
00083     txtStatusBar->setText("Scanning audio archives...this may take several minutes...please wait...");
00084     txtStatusBar->repaint(true);
00085     for (unsigned short i = 48; i < 64; i++) {
00086         if (i < 58) subdir = i;
00087         else subdir = i + 39;
00088     
00089         path = AUDIO_PATH + (char)subdir;
00090         cout << "Scanning: " << path << endl;
00091         dirp = opendir(path.c_str());
00092         while (dirp) {
00093             errno = 0;
00094             if ((dp = readdir(dirp)) != NULL) {
00095                 filename = dp->d_name;
00096                 if (filename.length() > 5) {
00097                     if (filename.substr(filename.length() - 5, 5) == ".info") {
00098                         newTrack = new trackinfo(C, 
00099                                         filename.substr(filename.length() - 37,
00100                                         filename.length() - 5
00101                                         ));
00102                         if (!newTrack->hasAudio()) {
00103                             delete newTrack;
00104                             continue;
00105                         }
00106                         newTrack->readFromFile();
00107                         newTrack->clean();
00108                         if (newTrack->inDB()) {
00109                             currentTracks->push_back(newTrack);
00110                         }
00111                         else {
00112                             newTracks->push_back(newTrack);
00113                         }
00114                     }
00115                 }
00116             }
00117             else {
00118                 if (errno == 0) {
00119                     closedir(dirp);
00120                     break;
00121                 }
00122                 closedir(dirp);
00123                 break;
00124             }
00125         }
00126     }
00127     cout << "done." << endl;
00128     UpdateLists();
00129     stringstream status;
00130     status << "Ready. " << newTracks->size() << " tracks to be imported.";
00131     txtStatusBar->setText(status.str());
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 void frmAdmin::AddTracks() {
00136     stringstream status;
00137     txtStatusBar->setText("Adding new tracks to database...");
00138     txtStatusBar->repaint(true);
00139     unsigned int number_of_tracks = newTracks->size();
00140     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < number_of_tracks; i++) {
00141         status.str("");
00142         status << "Importing track " << i << ".         " << number_of_tracks << "." << endl;
00143         txtStatusBar->setText(status.str());
00144         txtStatusBar->repaint(true);
00145         newTracks->at(0)->audio_trim();
00146         newTracks->at(0)->saveToDB();
00147         currentTracks->push_back(newTracks->at(0));
00148         newTracks->erase(newTracks->begin());
00149     }
00150     UpdateLists();
00151     txtStatusBar->setText("Ready.");
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 
00156 void frmAdmin::UpdateLists() {
00157     cout << "Updating display..." << flush;
00158     txtStatusBar->setText("Updating Display...");
00159     txtStatusBar->repaint(true);
00160     QString title;
00161     QString artist;
00162     lstManageNew->clear();
00163     lstManageCurrent->clear();
00164     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < newTracks->size(); i++) {
00165         title = newTracks->at(i)->title();
00166         artist = newTracks->at(i)->artist();
00167         lstManageNew->insertItem(title + " (" + artist + ")", -1);
00168     }
00169     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < currentTracks->size(); i++) {
00170         title = currentTracks->at(i)->title();
00171         artist = currentTracks->at(i)->artist();
00172         lstManageCurrent->insertItem(title + " (" + artist + ")", -1);
00173     }
00174     cout << "done." << endl;
00175 }

00178 void frmAdmin::test()
00179 {
00180     lstSustDirectory->addColumn( "Item" );
00181     lstSustDirectory->addColumn( "Description" );
00182     QPixmap folder = QPixmap("./dir_folder.bmp");
00183     QPixmap audio = QPixmap("./dir_audio.bmp");
00184     QListViewItem *element = new QListViewItem( lstSustDirectory, "root", "this is a root element" );
00185     element->setPixmap( 0, folder );
00186     QListViewItem *element2 = new QListViewItem( element, "audio1", "this is an audio file" );
00187     element2->setPixmap( 0, audio );
00188     QListViewItem *element3 = new QListViewItem( element, "folder", "this is a subfolder");
00189     element3->setPixmap( 0, folder);
00190     QListViewItem *element4 = new QListViewItem( element3, "audio2", "this is another audio file" );
00191     element4->setPixmap( 0, audio);
00192 }
